name: screens
description:
a game i made for class*, part bullet hell, shooter, and side scroller. layer all that creamy goodness along with a "hot hot story line" (Watson, 2015) and SICK unreleased beats by my boy long season and you have yourself screens, the Best** game of 2015. Also available in Arm6 for all you raspberry pi lovers out there (i haven't tested this so dont expect it to work)

*it's all done with processing and less than 3 weeks dev for the entire thing so there are bound to be bugs and other inconsistencies. i plan on remaking this at some point in another engine and actually polishing it (and adding things that never got in because of time restrictions)

**as rated by nobody
